response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your success. Considering its worth to both myself and potential buyers, I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you secure this valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 750000}
